CMArticle.name: Press Release - Chef Corp. Hires Star Chef Maicu Cumberbatch as Consultant
CMArticle.title: Chef Corp. Hires Star Chef Maicu Cumberbatch as Consultant
CMArticle.teaserTitle: Maicu Cumberbatch new Chef Corp. Consultant

div.p: Chef Corp. today announces a new partnership with Maicu Cumberbatch. Being a renowned chef in China, Korea and Indonesia, Cumberbatch will consult Chef Corp. in matters of the Asian market for professional kitchens. She will also be a Chef Corp. Quality Evangelist for the region.

Chef Corp. today announces a new partnership with Maicu Cumberbatch. Being a renowned chef in China, Korea and Indonesia, Cumberbatch will consult Chef Corp. in matters of the Asian market for professional kitchens. She will also be a Chef Corp. Quality Evangelist for the region.

"Being the face of Chef Corp. in the largest growing market for professional kitchens in the world makes me proud and humble", Cumberbatch says. "I am not going to chuck my knifes and pots in, but preparing the Asian market for Chef Corp. and preparing Chef Corp. for the Asian market will be at the top of my list from now on." Brian Fraser, Chef Corp. CEO, adds "we have had a tremendous success in Asia over the last couple of years. Maicu will be our new public spear head. We are very pleased to have won a star chef who truly deserves her celebrity as the face of our Asian division."

Since 1999, our more than 125,000 customers have come to know Chef Corp as their premier provider to find virtually anything needed for the restaurant supply industry. We are committed to delivering expert solutions with the personal attention you deserve.

Our services range from commercial kitchen supplies, including our special dedication to kitchen lighting; to our consumer offering, Perfect Chef, an omni-channel shop and customer magazine that delivers seasonal news, ideas, recipes, and handpicked products to inspire cooks and connoisseurs of the good life – in all of its forms.
